channel.title: Projects on The Fundamentalist Historian
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on The Fundamentalist Historian

item.title: Firm Foundation
item.description: Digitizing and Analyzing the Firm Foundation Founded in 1884 in Austin, Texas, the Firm Foundation grew to become one of the most influential publications affiliated with Churches of Christ, the most conservative of the three main branches of the restorationist Stone-Campbell Movement.
